title: Acrobats of God (TEFC)
creator_credit: Martha Graham Centre for Contemporary Dance, H Poindexter and Dave Wilson
brief_description: Presents Martha Graham and her company in a dance performance which celebrates the trials, discipline, denials, glories, and delights of a dancer’s world. Choreography by Martha Graham. Music by Carlos Surinach.
